meanings.sent1: The trilobed leaf had three distinct sections.
meanings.sent2: The trilobed cookie was easily shared among three friends.
meanings.sent3: The trilobed pizza slice made it fun to decide who got which part.
meanings.sent4: Her trilobed necklace symbolized the past, present, and future.
meanings.sent5: The trilobed puzzle piece fit perfectly into the final spot.

meanings.sent1: The trilobed flower petals added a unique touch to the bouquet.
meanings.sent2: The trilobed rock formation stood out among the smooth stones.
meanings.sent3: The trilobed cake slice made the party guests smile.
meanings.sent4: His trilobed keychain represented his family of three.
meanings.sent5: The trilobed cloud in the sky resembled a three-part harmony.
